subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray overpowered Kei Nishikori, 6-3, 6-0, setting up a Shanghai Masters final against David Ferrer and taking another step in his bid to pass Roger Federer in the rankings.
snippet: Andy Murray overpowered Kei Nishikori, 6-3, 6-0, setting up a Shanghai Masters final against David Ferrer and taking another step in his bid to pass Roger Federer in the rankings.
